name: Apollo's Sun - Falling Becomes Great.
description: Apollo's Sun "Falling Becomes Great" was Apollo's first full length LP that dropped in 2010 in a limited release. This record is officially sold out and no longer in print. The digital version can still be purchased on Itunes or downloaded over at www.apollossun.bandcamp.com.

name: Apollo's Sun and The Boomjacks "The Ownlife Sessions, Vol. 1" Limited Edition CD
description:
The Ownlife Sessions is a small collection of tunes by lyricist Apollo's Sun and beatsmith duo The Boomjacks. The term "Ownlife" was an idea introduced by author George Orwell in his classic book, 1984. The word is defined as such: "Ownlife refers to the tendency to enjoy being solitary or individualistic, which is considered subversive. Winston Smith comments that even to go for a walk by oneself can be regarded as suspicious." 

Be who you are. Walk alone. Do not let anyone define you. Ownlife.

*Apollo's Sun and The Boomjacks "The Ownlife Sessions, Vol. 1," is officially sold out and no longer in print. The digital version can still be purchased on Itunes or downloaded over at www.apollossun.bandcamp.com*

name: "I'm Only Here to Help"
description: SHIPPING NOW! "I'm Only Here to Help" is the first official book written by hip hop artist, Apollo's Sun. "I'm Only Here to Help" is a collection of lyrics taken from Apollo's 3 solo albums: The Happy Masochist, Rust, and Falling Becomes Great. In addition to lyrics, the book contains musings and insight as to why each song was written, the stories of the people from the albums, and a behind the scenes look at the recording process for each album. The initial printing is limited to 100 copies, all hand numbered and signed! They will go fast, so make sure you reserve your copy now!

name: Apollo's Sun - Rust.
description: The official follow up to The Happy Masochist, Rust was released in November, 2007. Rust was a limited print of 1000, with copies becoming more scarce. Pick it up before it is gone!

name: Apollo's Sun - The Happy Masochist
description: Apollo's Sun "The Happy Masochist," is officially sold out and no longer in print. The digital version can still be purchased on Itunes or downloaded over at www.apollossun.bandcamp.com
